verses.english: By the night when it covers
verses.hausa: Inã rantsuwa da dare a lõkacin da yake rufẽwa.

verses.english: And [by] the day when it appears
verses.hausa: Da yini a lõkacin da yake kuranyẽwa.

verses.english: And [by] He who created the male and female,
verses.hausa: Da abin da ya halitta namiji da mace.

verses.english: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
verses.hausa: Lãlle ne ayyukanku, dabam-dabam suke.

verses.english: As for he who gives and fears Allah
verses.hausa: To, amma wanda ya yi kyauta, kuma ya yi taƙawa.

verses.english: And believes in the best [reward],
verses.hausa: Kuma ya gaskata kalma mai kyãwo.

verses.english: We will ease him toward ease.
verses.hausa: To, zã Mu sauƙaƙe masa har ya kai ga sauƙi.

verses.english: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need
verses.hausa: Kuma amma wanda ya yi rõwa, kuma ya wadãtu da kansa.

verses.english: And denies the best [reward],
verses.hausa: Kuma ya ƙaryatar da kalma mai kyãwo.

verses.english: We will ease him toward difficulty.
verses.hausa: To, zã Mu sauƙaƙke masa har ya kai ga tsanani.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يُغْنِى عَنْهُ مَالُهُۥٓ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰٓ
verses.english: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?
verses.hausa: Kuma dũkiyarsa ba ta wadãtar masa da kõme ba, a lõkacin da ya gangara (a wuta).

verses.english: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.
verses.hausa: Lãlle aikinMu ne, Mu bayyana shiriya.

verses.english: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne Lãhira da duniya Namu ne.

verses.english: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, Na yi maku gargaɗi da wuta mai babbaka.

verses.english: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.
verses.hausa: Bãbu mai shigarta sai mafi shaƙãwa.

verses.english: Who had denied and turned away.
verses.hausa: Wanda ya ƙaryata, kuma ya jũya bãya.

verses.english: But the righteous one will avoid it -
verses.hausa: Kuma mafi taƙawa zai nisance ta.

verses.english: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
verses.hausa: Wanda yake bãyar da dũkiyarsa, alhãli yana tsarkaka.

verses.arabic: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُۥ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰٓ
verses.english: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded
verses.hausa: Alhãli bãbu wani mai wata ni'ima wurinsa wadda ake nẽman sakamakonta.

verses.english: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.
verses.hausa: Fãce dai nẽman yardar Ubangijinsa Mafi ɗaukaka.

verses.english: And he is going to be satisfied.
verses.hausa: To, lalle ne zai yarda (da sakamakon da zã a bã shi).
